page.title: 17TOURISM - CONTINUED
page.content: {FLATS AND BUNGALOWS. }In addition to units at the Harlyn Inn, there are approx. 30 various bungalows for holiday rental, plus a further 15/16 flat and bungalow units at 'Yellow Sands' Harlyn. A new holiday complex is under construction from farm buildings adjacent to Harlyn House. {FOR THE MOTORIST. }Car parking on Trevose Head (through Tollgate) and above Harlyn Beach. {LIGHTHOUSE ON TREVOSE HEAD.}The Light- house keepers are normally willing to admit the public, in daylight hours and fair weather.
